content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide detailed instructions for assembly.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure has 3 layers
- Bottom layer: 3 orange cylindrical blocks
- Middle layer: 2 yellow rectangular blocks placed horizontally
- Top layer: 1 green vertical block with a yellow curved top piece

Block count and identification:
- 3 orange cylinders (Block #10)
- 2 yellow horizontal rectangles (Block #6)
- 1 green vertical rectangle (Block #2)
- 1 yellow curved top piece (Block #12)

Assembly Order:
{
Step1: Move block with index 10 (first orange cylinder, left)
Step2: Move block with index 10 (second orange cylinder, right)
Step3: Move block with index 10 (third orange cylinder, back)
Step4: Move block with index 6 (first yellow rectangle)
Step5: Move block with index 6 (second yellow rectangle)
Step6: Move block with index 2 (green vertical block)
Step7: Move block with index 12 (yellow curved top piece)
}

The structure should be built from bottom to top, starting with the three supporting orange cylinders, then the horizontal yellow platform, followed by the green vertical piece, and finally topped with the yellow curved piece.
